attributes.action: Make e-bikes, e-scooters, and e-skateboards legal.
attributes.additional_details: Electric transportation is an amazing alternative to using public transport or purchasing a road legal vehicle. This would allow access to a form of transportation that would be more Eco-friendly while also being more affordable than everyday vehicles in the long term. It also fits well with the environmental policies of the current government.
attributes.background:
Change e-bikes so that they are no longer classed as motor vehicles and re-class them as bicycles.
Allow for the use of electric skateboards and scooters in public areas and streets.
